name: Out of the Box (itch) (FishyGames🐟)
description:
Out of the Box, where you control your rowdy little lizard through remote configuration.  GMTK game jam 2020, my second game jam, please don't be too harsh on me. Enjoy!  :))

Take note: red tinted items tend to be dangerous for lizards and green tinted items are collectible items.

Excuses why i did so bad (hehe) : I've got a national exam the next day, this started at 3AM for me, I participated in a hackathon CTF on the exact same weekend, im very young and inexperienced. (●'◡'●)
